item.title: Kullback-Leibler Divergence (KL Divergence)
item.description: Kullback-Leibler Divergence (KL Divergence) # Definition: # Measures the distance between 2 prabability distributions Explanation + Proof: # Base Video: Intuitively Understanding the KL Divergence - YouTube Sequence of flips: H -> H -> T ….. Multiply the probabilities from both the coins for the corresponding heads and tails. It is nothing but: for True coin: P1 raise to something and P2 raise to something else For coin2: Q1 raise to soemthing and Q2 raise to something else
